name: A And A Orange: 2000 Levels
description:
Sticks, Circles, Dots. What's fun about that !? Trust me.
This is a very addictive game and much more.
This is the coolest dots game ever.
Become a Super Star with A And A Super Star Limited Black Edition.

+ Brand new 2000 Levels.
+ Cool Graphic.
+ This is not just a crazy game. This is a Super Star.

More Levels, more challenging, more fun.

Enjoy !
